thing-type.label: PSR04 Smart Color Button
thing-type.description: Smart Color Button<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtThis device is a multiple functions button switch. It is able to switch the appliances on/off or adjust the percentage of dimmer.<br /&gtIt can also work as a timer. The well designed wall bracket and magnetic back let the switch can be fixed on the wall. This product<br /&gtcan be included and operated in any Z-Wave™ network with other Z-Wave™ certified devices from other manufacturers and/or other applications.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gt<strong&gtSee manual for details.</strong&gt</p&gt <p&gtPointing the arrowhead to area A first (shown in Fig. 2). Pressing the button three times within 1.5 seconds. The red LED will light up for 1 second if succeed. </p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gt<strong&gtSee manual for details.</strong&gt</p&gt <p&gt Pointing the arrowhead to area A first (shown in Fig. 2). Pressing the button three times within 1.5 seconds. </p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gtBy default, this device only wakes up every 86400 seconds (24 hours). To manually wake this device up:</p&gt <ol&gt<li&gtHold the device vertically, or against a wall (this will not work if the device is horizontal).</li&gt <li&gtRotate the wheel so that the pointer is at the top of the device.</li&gt <li&gtWait at least three seconds.</li&gt <li&gtRotate the wheel clockwise through 180 degrees to the bottom of the device.</li&gt <li&gtImmediately press the centre button once.</li&gt </ol&gt<p&gtThis activates the wakeup for 10 seconds, during which time you will be able to identify the device correctly.</p&gt

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Basic Set OFF level
parameter.description: Control the value represented by the left-side in area D.<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt E.g. Setting this configuration to 0x0F means range of Command Basic Set value start from 0x0F.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Basic Set ON level
parameter.description: Control the value represented by the right-side in area D.<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt E.g. Setting this configuration to 0x1E means range of Command Basic Set value start from 0x1E.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_10_1
parameter.label: 10: Auto Report Battery Time
parameter.description: The interval time for auto reporting the Battery level.<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0: Function is disabled.<br /&gt1 - 127: Define the time interval.</p&gt <p&gt0 means turn off auto report battery. The default value of 12 is equivalent to 6 hours.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_25_1
parameter.label: 25: Customer Function
parameter.description: Bit 0: Dimmer setting method. Bit 1: Disable buzzer in timer mode.

parameter.name: config_26_1
parameter.label: 26: Disable Scene Holding report
parameter.description: Send Central Scene Holding when the button is held.

parameter.name: group_1
parameter.label: 1: Controller updates
parameter.description: For receiving the report message, like the battery level.

parameter.name: group_2
parameter.label: 2: Light control
parameter.description: For light control. The device will send Basic Set command to this group.
